label:label.xlink:title: Every combination of columns c0050 'Critical Function: Country' and c0060 'Critical Function: ID' from tab 'Z 10.02 Mapping of Information Systems (CIS 2)' should be available in the columns c0010 'Critical functions: Country' and c0020 'Critical functions: ID' in tab 'Z 07.02 Mapping of critical functions by legal entity (FUNC 2)'
